metadata.description: Fall of Cthulhu returns with Nemesis, an epic origin story revealing the secret history behind Nyarlathotep's favorite companion. Who is Nemesis you ask? Get this book and find out! Be prepared for the shock of your life as BOOM!'s bestselling horror title continues. Available with covers from Jeffery Spokes and Chuck BB.
metadata.name: Fall of Cthulhu Vol. 6: Nemesis
